title: The Shape of the Wind
description: I am a Healer and Princess of the Aerilon people; I never thought I’d end up a slave.When I’m rescued by a fierce Mosauran Dragon warrior, I am both grateful and wary. Rowan is a Prince of the Empire, and his species is one of the most feared in the galaxy, and also an enemy of mine.But the more time we spend together, the more I find myself drawn to him in ways I don’t understand.Our two races have been enemies for thousands of cycles and our differences are many.I know I can trust him with my life, but can I also trust him with my heart?
author: Jessica Grayson
